history.proof: intros d a. unfold div_mon, zero_mon. rewrite is_nil_id. hfcrush use: mult_div_com, is_nil_id, mult_mon_zero_l unfold: div_mon, zero_mon.

exceptions.exn: In environment d : nat a : mon d Unable to unify "is_nil d (nat_rec (fun d : nat => mon d) n_0 (fun (n : nat) (Rec : mon n) => c_n n 0 Rec) d)" with "nat_rec (fun d : nat => mon d -> mon d -> mon d) (fun _ _ : mon 0 => n_0) (fun (n : nat) (Rec : mon n -> mon n -> mon n) (S1 S2 : mon (S n)) => c_n n (pmon1 (S n) S1 - pmon1 (S n) S2) (Rec (pmon2 (S n) S1) (pmon2 (S n) S2))) d a a".

original: intros d a. unfold div_mon, zero_mon. rewrite is_nil_id. reflexivity.
